mapper.select: select * from sys_user where login_id = #{loginId} and is_deleted = '0'
SELECT su.user_id, su.user_name, rm.role_name, su.telephone, su.initial_password, su.email FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN role_master rm ON su.role_id = rm.role_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT su.login_id, su.user_name, su.telephone, dm.department_name, rm.role_name FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN department_master dm on dm.department_id = su.department_id LEFT JOIN role_master rm on rm.role_id = su.role_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
